definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: Ancillary products are sold to various car manufacturers use.
sentences.chinese: 产品主要销往各配套汽车厂家使用。

sentences.english: Nowadays ZAZ (that is a short name for the plant) is absolutely different than before.
sentences.chinese: 现在的扎波罗热汽车厂绝对是面貌焕然一新。

sentences.english: They converted an automobile factory to the manufacture of tanks.
sentences.chinese: 他们把一家汽车厂改置为生产坦克。

sentences.english: Some of China's auto makers are already scrambling to adapt.
sentences.chinese: 一些中国汽车厂家已经开始主动适应这一局面。

sentences.english: Other auto makers also have ambitious plans to develop alternative technologies in China.
sentences.chinese: 其他汽车厂家也有在中国开发替代性技术的宏伟计划。

pinyin: Tong1 yong4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1
